column.name: isStreamOne
column.remarks: Is this item a StreamOne product or not

changeSet.author: pavwebdevmt

column.name: streamOneLicenseManagement
column.remarks: Determine if streamone item in the menu will display or not

changeSet.author: pavwebdevmt
changeSet.sql: UPDATE consultant SET streamOneLicenseManagement =1 WHERE cns_consno IN (29, 2, 50, 47, 138)

changeSet.author: pavwebdevmt
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `streamOneCustomers` ( `id` INT (10) NOT NULL, `name` VARCHAR (100), `email` VARCHAR (100), `createdOn` DATE, `country` VARCHAR (10), `companyName` VARCHAR (100), `city` VARCHAR (100), `addressLine1` VARCHAR (1000), `addressLine2` VARCHAR (1000), `MsDomain` VARCHAR (1000), `phone1` VARCHAR (50), `postalCode` VARCHAR (50), `title` VARCHAR (50), `endCustomerId` VARCHAR (100), endCustomerPO VARCHAR (100), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

changeSet.author: pavwebdevmt
changeSet.sql: UPDATE `customer` SET `streamOneEmail` =(SELECT MIN(con_email) FROM `contact` WHERE contact.`con_custno`=`cus_custno` AND `con_email` IN (SELECT email FROM streamOneCustomers));

changeSet.author: pavwebdevmt
